unitName: Radiography and medical imaging work experience
description: Students enrolled in the Bachelor of Radiography and Medical Imaging must complete the placement in order to satisfy the professional requirements that a period of supervised practice be completed prior to graduation and application for registration issued by the Medical Radiation Practice Board of Australia.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
